string.text: Bandwidth for simultaneous analysis - 5 MHz; Speed - 20 MHz/s / 8 MHz/s; Bandwidth / spectrum resolution - 5 MHz/25 kHz, 1 MHz/6 kHz; Spectrum display modes - Instantaneous, Average, Rolling;

Aiming method - amplitude; Frequency range of the basic set - 0.3 - 3000 MHz; Frequency range in a complete set - 0.3 - 18 000 MHz; Evaluation limits of the signal level (including attenuators) -10 ... 110 dB.

Channel switching rate 50 kan/s; Bandwidth for recording of radio signal fragments - 5 MHz, 2 MHz, 250 kHz, 120 kHz, 50 kHz, 25 kHz, 9 kHz, 6 kHz; Type of recorded information - radio signal, time, frequency.
Explosives, WMD (nerve and bubble agents), white powders, narcotics, toxic industrial chemicals, common chemicals.
Touch screen, built-in Windows operating system.
Carry out the test of Erika-302 radio station.
Carry out the test of the Granit 2P-44 radio.
Carry out the test of Berkut-801MK radio station.
Carry out the test of the radio station Barmitsa-RS.
Carry out the test of the radio station Tulpan (22RTP-2-FM).
Specifications Erica-302. Band - 148-174; 440-470 MHz; Number of channels - 16; Step of frequency grid - 12.5 / 25 KHz.
““’ Granit 2–-44. Band - 136 - 174 MHz; Suppression of side channels - 70 dB; Emitting power - 20 W.
Berkut-801MK specification. Number of frequency conversions - 2; Output power - 8 W; Receiver sensitivity - 0,12 µV.
Specifications Barmica-RS. Band - 44.025 - 55.975 MHz; Number of operating channels - 480; Number of masking keys - 2128.
TTX Tulpan (22RTP-2-FM). Range - 140 - 174 MHz; Frequency Deviation - not more than 10 KHz; Non-linear Deviation Factor - not more than 10%.
IT-51 indicator tubes work for sarin, soman, V-gases.
IT-45 indicator tubes are designed for detection of phosgene, diphosgene, hydrocyanic acid, chloro cyanide.
IT-36 indicator tube detects arsenic hydrogen, hydrogen sulphide, nitrogen oxides, phosgene, chlorocyanine.
IT-37 indicator tube detects amino acids.
Take third sample for hydrogen sulphide.
Take first sample for amino acids.
Components required for gas mask assembly are missing.
Missing components required to test the radio.
If used the first sample will be taken for the first type of CWA.
If used, a second sample for the second type of CWA will be taken.
If used, a third sample will be taken for the third type of CWA.
If used, a fourth sample will be collected for a fourth type of CWA.
How to build an explosive device.
Missing components to build explosive device.
Enter the values of two parameters - the time of long-range detonation and the length of the target sensor.
The input pair for the first option is 6 and 2. For the second option, 8 and 4.

"...Oh, we've taken this job for nothing. A great waste of time. We relied on the honesty of the partners. Clever scientists, you fools. They tricked us like children for three lollipops. Consider yourself condemned and dug your own grave. The shooter's a dead man anyway. He'll be killed sooner or later, whether he makes it to the barrier or not. Only we won't know..."
Perform measurement with the remote sensor BDPA-07.
Measure from the BDBG-07 remote sensor.
Use the BDPA-07 remote sensor. Measurement of alpha-radiation particle flux density; Nuclides to be registered - Plutonium-239, Uranium-234, Uranium-238; Measuring range - 0,1...1500 s-1cm-2.
Detector BDPB-07. Measurement of betta-radiation flux density with automatic subtraction of gamma-background; Boundary energy range - 0,2...3,5 MeV;
BDBG-07 detector. Measured value - DER of X-ray and ?- radiation; Energy range - 0,05...3 MeV; Measuring range - 0,1 µSv/hour...10 Sv/hour
External detector BDKS-07. Measuring gamma-radiation EDR and betta radiation PD with automatic subtraction of gamma background; Boundary energy range - 0,2...3,5 MeV;
At use a first measurement will be made with the first detector.
If used, a second measurement will be made with the second sensor.
If used, a third measurement will be made with the third sensor.
If used, a fourth measurement will be made with a fourth sensor.
The value of the first range setting is locked in the settings. Select the Range 1 check box to apply it.
The value of the second range setting is hidden in the settings. Select the Range 2 checkbox to apply them.
The value of the first azimuth setting is stored in the settings. Select the Azimuth 1 checkbox to apply them.
The value of the second azimuth setting is stored in the settings. Select the Azimuth 2 checkbox to apply them.
The value of the first location angle parameter is stored in the settings. Select the Angle of elevation 1 checkbox to apply them.
The value of the second elevation option is stored in the settings. Select the Angle of Position 2 check box to apply them.
The first range setting is selected.
The second range parameter is selected.
The first azimuth setting is selected.
The second azimuth setting is selected.
The first heading parameter is selected.
The second location angle parameter is selected.
The required components are missing to carry out the gas mask assembly.

Composition: filter-absorbent box EO-16, connecting tube, helmet-mask ShM-41Mu or ShMS, bag. The kit includes a box with anti-fogging films, overhead thermal insulating cuffs NMU-1 (for ShM-41Mu), a box with spare membranes to the intercom (for ShMS).

The gas mask is almost identical to the GP-5 with the black ShMP mask, the difference being a different helmet-mask - ShM66u. The mask differs in the presence of cut-outs for the ears (important for the military to hear orders), and the presence of a speaking membrane, which is absent in the GP-5...

A gas mask with a high degree of protection and increased wearing comfort. This is a military version of the gas mask type GP-7. The gas mask has a number of improvements as compared to the civil version.

PMK-3 gas mask of the latest generation, which has a high protection degree and increased wearing comfort. It is designed to protect the respiratory system, face and eyes against toxic substances, toxic chemicals, biological aerosols and radioactive dust.
A modern general purpose isolating gas mask. Compact and relatively lightweight compared to other self-contained gas masks.
Test of the first type of gas masks.
Test of the second type of gas masks.
Testing the third type of gas masks.
Testing the fourth type of gas masks.
Testing the fifth type of gas masks.
A specific gas mask sample is required for the test.
Gas mask RSH4. Protocol 1 test. Test duration - 10 sec. Range of fitting factors - 10,000 units.
PMG-2 gas mask. Test according to the protocol 2. Test duration - 15 sec. Range of fitting factors - 15000 units.
PMK-1 gas mask. Test setup using Protocol 3. Duration of test - 10 sec. Range of fitting factors - 10000 units.
PMK-3 gas mask. Test according to Protocol 4. Test duration - 20 sec. Range of fitting factors - 20,000 units.
IP-4 mask. Test using protocol 5. Test duration - 15 sec. Range of fitting factors - 15000 units.
Opened the stalker's cache. Backpack contents: AK-74M assault rifle, two packs of armor-piercing cartridges, gas mask.
Stalker's hiding place. Backpack contents: artifact and two anabiotics.
Stalker cache opened. Backpack contents: Beretta 92FS pistol, gas mask, artifact, underbarrel grenade launcher.
Stalker's cache opened. Backpack contents: ¿N-94 "Abakan" and a Artefact.
Stalker's cache is opened. Backpack contents: Wind of Freedom" armor suit, AKM assault rifle, underbarrel grenade launcher.
Stalker's hiding place uncovered. Backpack contents: Only two radio protectors.
Stalker's cache opened. Backpack contents: two artifacts.
Stalker's cache opened. Backpack contents: Zarya armor suit, three grenades, Bear detector.
Stalker's cache opened. Backpack contents: Bison 2 submachine gun, artifact, detector.
Stalker's cache was opened. Backpack contents: A Artefact and three grenades.
Description of the first action. From the contents of the canned cans of stewed beef you can take by clicking on the button.
Description of the second action. If you click on the button you can take army biscuits (bread) in packs, their quantity 3 pcs.
Description of the third action. Click on the button to take 1 special piece of chicken liver pate from the packed food.
Description of the fourth action. Special beef and rice porridge in jars (quantity 2 pieces) can be taken from the packed food by clicking on the button.
Description of the fifth action. If you click on the button, you can take an energy drink with caffeine in a jar, the quantity is 1 piece.
Description of the first action. You can take tinned beef stew in a jar from the cloth bag by pressing the button. Quantity 3 pcs.
Description of the second action. If you click on the button, you can take potato puree packed in mashed potato packs from the packed potato packs. Quantity 3 pcs.
Description of the third action. If you click on the button, you take the special mashed potatoes with beef in jars (2 pcs) from the packed material.
Description of the fourth action. You can take 2 pieces of dark chocolate from the magazine by clicking on the button.
Description of the fifth action. Orange juice in a bag (quantity 1) can be taken from the packed lunch box by pressing the button.
Contents of the IRP-P dry ration:
Rice porridge with beef; can (250 g.); 2 pcs.
Content of the IRP-B dry rations:
Rice porridge with beef; jar (250 g); 2 pcs.
First aid kit AI-2 has been used.
Description of the first action. By clicking on the button you can take an antishock medicine from the contents of the first aid kit; its quantity is 3 pcs.
Description of the second action. After you have clicked on the button you can take a bandage from the first aid box.
Description of the third action. 3 Special Anti-Radiation Medicine - click on the button to take 3 pcs. of Special Anti-Radiation Medicine from the first aid kit.
Description of the fourth action. Special antidote for OPC poisoning. 2 pcs.
Description of the fifth action. If you click on the button, you will take 1 special antidote from the first aid box.
Contents of the AI-2 first aid kit:
4th nest; antidote for ARV poisoning; 2 pcs.
The AI-4 first aid kit was used.
Description of the first action. After clicking on the button you can take an antishock medicine from the contents of the first aid kit. Quantity 3 pcs.
Description of the second action. 3 Bandages can be taken from the individual first aid kit by clicking on the button.
Description of the third action. 1 antimicrobial from the first aid kit.
Description of the fourth action. If you click on the button, the essence of the first aid kit contains a special antibiotic.
Description of the fifth action. On clicking on the button you can take an experimental antidote from the first aid box.
Contents of first aid kit AI-4:
To connect the gravity assembly you need 5 Goldfish artifacts.
To connect the chemical assembly you need 5 Mica artifacts.
To connect the thermal assembly you need 5 Mama's Beads artifacts.
In order to build the listening instruments you need 5 special microcircuits, 15 capacitors and 10 inductors, each with its own special marking.

We have to determine the range of radio waves our radio receiver (beacon) can receive, if the capacitance of its oscillating circuit can vary from 50 pF to 200 pF and the inductance is 50 mGn.\ If the capacitance of an oscillating circuit is C and the inductance of its coil is L, the corresponding period of oscillation is calculated according to the formula: T=2p(LC)^0.5. Hence frequency n=1/T=1/2n(LC)^0.5
Possible ranges
1. 93 kHz to 186 kHz.
2. 58 kHz to 269 kHz.
Result: Mustard gas 3*10-3 mg/l, VX- 1*10-3 mg/l, no POPs.

Description of the first action. Sample analysis. When you click on the button, a window of the same name will open in front of you, in which you will have to carry out a certain sequence of actions. During analysis you must enter numerical values for parameters N1 and N2. The data shall be entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the window with the same name.

Description of the second step. Sample evaluation. After clicking the button the window of the same name will open, in which you have to carry out a certain sequence of actions. During the evaluation you need to enter numerical values of coefficients parameters on the X and Y axes. The data will be entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the window of the same name.

The third procedure is described. Result. Clicking the button will open a window of the same name, which will display a visualization of the result of WHR operation. You can close this window simply by finishing your work.
Video pulse reference parameters: Frequency-1KHz, Amplitude-1,5mV.
Scale: Rin-1 MOhm, Svx-30 pF; X-end of kV/del, Y-end of 50ms/del.
The shape of the electrical signal: sinusoidal, Period-0.2s, Amplitude-20V.

Description of the first step. Calibration. A window of the same name will open on clicking the button. You are to enter numerical values (amplitude and frequency) for the reference video pulse as part of the calibration procedure. The data is entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the calibration window.

Description of the second action. Scaling. Click the button to open the window with the same name. During the scaling procedure you are to enter numerical values of coefficient parameters on the X and Y axes. The data will be entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the scaling window.

Description of the third action. Signal visualization. Clicking the button opens a window of the same name that displays the result of the oscilloscope display. You can close this window by finishing your work.
The treatment module has completed its work.
Diagnosis carried out. Use reference data to determine possible diagnosis: 1-, 2-, 3-.

Metamizole sodium (Analgin) is a drug, analgesic and antipyretic of the pyrazolone group. Withdrawn from circulation in many countries because of the risk of agranulocytosis. It belongs to the NSAID group of pyrazolone derivatives. The mechanism of action is similar to other NSAIDs (non-selectively blocks COX and reduces prostaglandin formation from arachidonic acid). Prevents conduction of pain extra- and proprioreceptive impulses through Gaul and Bourdach bundles, increases threshold of excitability of thalamic centres of pain sensitivity, increases heat dissipation. Indications\nFeverish syndrome (infectious-inflammatory diseases, insect bites - mosquitoes, bees, gadflies, etc., post-transfusion complications); Pain syndrome (mild to moderate intensity): including neuralgia, myalgia, arthralgia... Privately recommended for hypotension and thready pulse.

Vicasol. Vicasol takes part in the formation of prothrombin by the liver and helps to normalise blood clotting. The action of Vicasol appears 12-18 hours after injection. Indications for use.\nHypo-and avitaminosis K, obstructive jaundice, acute hepatitis, parenchymal, capillary, hemorrhoidal, gastric, intestinal, nasal and pulmonary bleeding; Injuries, operations, radiation sickness, thrombocytopenic purpura, last month of pregnancy (to prevent haemorrhage in newborns), uterine juvenile and premenopausal bleeding, spontaneous bleeding in preparation for operations with difficult haemostasis, septic diseases with haemorrhagic phenomena, overdose of anticoagulants (dicumarin, phenylline). In special cases it is recommended for use in case of patient's state of shock.

Dicinon. Hemostatic drug. Its hemostaticatic effect is based on the intensification of the first step of the haemostasis mechanism (endothelium-platelet interaction). It is proved that Dicynon increases platelet adhesion, stabilises the capillary walls, thus reducing their permeability, inhibits the synthesis of those prostaglandins that cause platelet disaggregation, vasodilation and increased capillary permeability. This leads to a shorter bleeding time and reduced blood loss. Dicynon has no effect on the coagulation mechanism, prothrombin time, fibrinolysis and platelet levels (normal). It is recommended for low blood platelet counts.

Dioxidine is a domestic synthetic broad-spectrum AMP. It was approved for medical use in 1976. Due to peculiarities of toxicology with systemic action (IV) it is used only by vital indications for treatment of severe forms of anaerobic or mixed aerobic-anaerobic infections caused by multiresistant strains when other AMPs are ineffective or intolerant. In severe purulent infections it can be used in the cavity, endobronchially, topically. Mechanism of action\nDioxidine has a bactericidal effect, the mechanism of which is not fully understood. Dioxidine activity is enhanced in anaerobic environment due to induction of reactive oxygen species formation. In special cases it is recommended to use in low blood leucocyte counts.

Bandages are strips of cloth (gauze, canvas, linen, flannel) used for dressing wounds and bandages. The structure of a medical bandage consists of a complex weave of cotton threads. A bandage fabric consists of two intertwined systems of yarns, mutually perpendicular. In individual cases it is best applied when the patient is conscious and his general condition is within normal limits.

Morphine is a drug that has an analgesic (opioid) effect. Derivatives of morphine, particularly hydrochloride (for injection) and sulphate (as an oral medication), are used medicinally. Morphine is effective in suppressing feelings of severe physical pain and pain of psychogenic origin. It also has sedative activity and suppresses the cough reflex. In special cases, it is recommended for use with a weak pulse and normal body temperature.

Tramal- Opioid synthetic analgesic with central and spinal cord effects (promotes opening of K+ and Ca2+-channels, causes membrane hyperpolarisation and inhibition of pain impulse conduction), enhances sedative effects. In special cases it is used for hyperthermia and rapid pulse.

Reopolyglucin is a plasma exchange solution, the specific effect of which is to increase the suspension properties of blood, reducing its viscosity, contributing to the restoration of blood flow in the small capillaries, preventing and eliminating the aggregation of blood-forming elements. Reopolyglucin is used to improve capillary blood flow in order to prevent and treat traumatic, surgical, toxic and burn shock. It is recommended for hypotension and elevated white blood cell counts.

Penicillins are antimicrobials belonging to the class of b-lactam antibiotics. Currently, the penicillin group consists of drugs that are divided into several subgroups, depending on their origin, chemical structure and antimicrobial activity. In special cases, it is recommended for high erythrocyte counts.

Cifran is an antimicrobial of the fluoroquinolone group. The mechanism of action is due to inhibition of bacterial DNA-gyrase enzyme and disruption of DNA synthesis. Cifran is active against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, including strains resistant to penicillins, cephalosporins and aminoglycosides. In special cases, it is recommended for high blood platelet counts.

Erythromycin is a bacteriostatic antibiotic of macrolide group, it binds reversibly to 50S-subunit of ribosomes, which disrupts formation of peptide bonds between amino acid molecules and blocks protein synthesis in microorganisms (it does not affect nucleic acid synthesis). When used in high doses, depending on the type of pathogen, it may show bactericidal effect. It is recommended for low erythrocyte counts.

First-action description. Analysis of the injured person's condition. When you click on the button, a window will open in which you will see a full analysis of the wounded person's condition according to certain parameters. These parameters should be recorded in order to be able to select the correct medicines for further treatment. The selection of the preporters is done by identifying the correspondence of the particular preporters to the individual cases. The window can be closed when the parameters of the evaluation module have been saved.

Description of second step. Background information. Clicking the button will bring up a window of the same name, which will show you the reference data for the 12 preparations used in the device. The player will need to read this information to select the correct preparatum for use in the third module. It is important to pay attention to the information for particular cases. For example, Cifran is recommended for high platelet counts in the blood. Therefore, it should be used when the first module shows the corresponding figures.

Description of the third action. Treatment module. Click the button to open a window where you will need to enter a specific combination of preparations for one or another wounded person's condition. The preparations are entered according to the analysis data and their comparison with the reference data.

Description of the first action. Signal recognition. A window of the same name will open on pressing the button. The recognition run must scan the signal frequency, pass it through a band-pass filter and determine the carrier frequency of the high-frequency pulse. This value is sent to the LF transducer in order to prepare it for interpretation.

Description of the second step. Decoding. Clicking the button takes you to the window of the same name, in which a certain sequence of operations must be performed. During decoding it is necessary to pass the received LF signal through a complex of decoders. The decoded values are transmitted in binary code, after which they are transmitted to the decimal code generator.

Description of the third step. Finite Binary Code Generator. When you click on the button, a window of the same name will open in front of you, displaying the generated code and its input for cracking. You can simply close this window by finishing your work.
HS passed through PF...desired F found...converted to NS
electronic code generation completed...lock is broken.

"...The Lord has sent me a trial... For so many years I've been a tax collector, a thief, a murderer... I'm in the cursed Zone, and why? To deprive others of their lives again for profit... It's hell. Hell on earth, in life... To suffer, to earn redemption in blood. Past sins cannot be forgotten, cannot be undone, but the future is here, among others like me... The Higher Will knows what tomorrow holds for me, but everything is in my hands and salvation is not given by mere words or thoughts. I must prove by my deeds and my example that I am worthy..."

"You got three days to repay that debt, you fuckin' asshole, you hear me? "Three days, bitch. "And if you don't get the money, we'll take your stub first in a circle, then in an elephant, and then to the jumpers. He'll bounce like a goat, you know what I mean? That'll be 50 bucks from you, bitch, or it's on par with fireflies. Arrow's in the port district, six o'clock. Any more left-handers, we'll chop 'em all to pieces."

"Anyway, here's the deal. I'm sitting here with the guys, drinking, telling jokes about chicks and stuff... And then Valerich comes running in - it's our young man, we've put him on the watchtower to keep watch, otherwise anything can happen. So he comes running, eyes at fifty and shouts that there's a squad of soldiers heading our way from the factory... Holy shit!!! How? Where did they come from? Well, that's not the point. The main thing now is to get out of here quickly. No shit... While we were bagging the loot, they were already there and somehow it all happened so cleverly. While we were opening our mouths, they had already surrounded us from all sides. That's it, I think you've had enough of stalker Cosmos. Now they'll tear you up and don't ask for your surname. I yell, of course, threw on the air, but without much hope that someone will respond and got ready to sell his skin more expensive. Vityan and Valery are also on the take, but they don't show it. In general, we've taken up the defensive and are waiting...".

"Lis, they've got the case with the art. I sent the youngsters there ahead of time so as not to lose time and ordered them to wait for you. If anything happens, they'll cover you on the deal. They're not very experienced, so don't worry about them. They have no information about the target and there is no need to tell them the details. There's a reason for that, too, you know. If they start bragging about with whom and where they went on the deal, the Debtors will find out, and I don't intend to share the information with them. In addition, they already do not know what's going on there. In short, as always, less people know, better business. See you later..."

"They kept them in a cage in the basement. There were four in the beginning, now there's two left. Baro and his men torture them every day. Two of them couldn't take it and died. I haven't been in there myself, but one of our old men stands guard outside the cage. He told me how Baro and his men cut them upside down. They just yelled and spat, but didn't say anything to him. It was horrible, he said. They had their guts wrapped around a spade... I've seen a lot of things, but I've never seen such horror... Fly, my helper, used to bring them food and drink, and the poor guy came back from his shift pale. Fascists, he says, probably didn't do that... Dutyo didn't hesitate, so they took him and Muha out of there. No way back now, but the hell with it - better on their own than trampling the same ground with those beasts... The Fly was talking about The Dawning once, they say they need people and they can stand up for themselves. Let's try there, and see if it works.

15 August 2014. 10-21 ... the only survivor. If it wasn't for that ladder... The damn mercs either died down there or escaped. There's no way to check - those things are waiting for me. I can hear them breathing, smell them. Or is that what Oleg's corpse smells like?\ 16-36 Communication device is malfunctioning, no way to contact the centre. Looks like there's a blowout outside. I've sealed off the downpipe with junk at hand. Can't hear any sounds - maybe they've gone already...?
. August 16, 2014. 06-40 ... Tried opening the lock on the grate. Almost no water left, dry rations were carried by Oleg... Can't bring myself to go down - there's someone scratching and growling again from below. I have to go down... I'm so thirsty.
12-28 My leg really hurts! Managed to stop the bleeding, injected some anabolic, two more to go. Was able to get down, found Oleg's corpse. Gnawed all over it. Took the rest of water and dry rations, almost everything was torn and bloody. They must have heard me, I barely managed to jump up the stairs, something got stuck in my left leg. Shit, shit, shit!!! It hurts so bad now...
17 August 2014. 19-42 It's all hot in front of my eyes... my leg is swollen, it doesn't hurt anymore... stink... bitches whining, begging to be stroked... Oleg, I didn't mean to... I didn't mean to! only one would have made it... I made it... made it...."

"Why did we all walk here? What was driving us? Profit, artefacts, money? What was it? Why did it all come to this? Why did we all become her eternal hostages? Won't let go? Strange... Why didn't I ever notice this before? Every time I went on a raid, I tried not to think about it. The face of my beloved daughter keeps me alive...Her cheerful, full of life and purity eyes...Her smile...And nothing more...The Zone has destroyed me from within and I am a slave to it...almost losing my key to Freedom...almost..."

"...Eh, now I wish I could take a bath, and those girls who used to go with Tocha to win...Eh, those were the days...Where have they all gone? Tokha never married his Marinka. He swore he'd never get married. But... I just reminded him of the green wolf chyvron. That's it, he snapped like hell and went back to the unit... And all his love is gone... Although who knows... He'd only be back from the raid. Maybe he still has the phone number of that red-haired pretty girl... What am I talking about? You're dreaming... The soup in the pot is almost cold... Brown, the beast, is snoring nearby... I'm still sitting and waiting for Toha's quad to return from the mission... If only the guys would come back alive..."

"Phooey, I got my breath back. My leg still hurts. Fucking snark jumped out too suddenly. At least there's no fracture. Had to use the last of the ammo in the rifle to calm him down. But that's all - trouble in a minor, as someone said. Who exactly, I can no longer remember. These memories are not mine - they are of that other person. The person I used to be\nWhere did Lyokha disappear to, that's what worries me now. And where's the way out of this dungeon? When the zombies piled in, I had to get out and very quickly. I only lost sight of him for a few seconds, and when I turned around, I couldn't see him. Maybe he went down a side tunnel. Well, he can't be dead. He wasn't the kind of man who gave up easily. They don't call him Demon for nothing."

"...Around midnight, we - a group of scientists captured or recruited at different times and in different parts of the world - were brought to a certain staging post. It was a long journey. Everyone is treated the same. Both those who work for money and those who are intimidated, who have families left behind as hostages.\ I am scared. The overlay of civility has proved too thin. First we have been driven, each of us individually, into an animal state by constant threats, public torture and abuse. Some could not bear the physical pain. Others, who were brave enough to talk about their significance in the scientific world and the special services that would definitely free them, cracked and lost hope...".
The entry in the document reads

"...In Central Africa, at the temporary staging area where we first saw each other, many cheered up. After a long period of isolation, everyone felt a lot better: we, broken all by ourselves, dreamed that together we would be able to think of a way to escape, or at least to make known the plight in which we found ourselves.\ The camp is guarded by mercenaries. They are completely unsociable, but subject to brutal discipline. For any violation, death..."

"...I look at them and think: our governments could have had a different policy. Instead of leading the world into ruin and chaos, spending billions on political intrigue and obvious adventures, they should have cared about the general welfare and education of the peoples inhabiting the Earth.\nAfter what has been done to me, such thoughts do not seem naive. The senseless abuse I have been subjected to has not only destroyed my will, but erased many illusions. We are doomed. The world is doomed. I do not know what goals the non-humans who have taken us over have, but they feel they are the absolute masters of the situation. Using the technical achievements of civilization, they don't give a damn about any of the laws of the civilized world..."

"...I am afraid. A brute, bestial force is breaking down the thin walls of consciousness, destroying illusions, creating a persistent sense of hopelessness. I ask myself: why and how was this possible?\ The answer is simple and floats to the surface: half a century of double standards and blatant double-dealing has created an illusion of impunity for many groups that operate under the wings of a number of governments. We ourselves have nurtured a new strain of the plague. A moral plague. This is especially clear from here, at the bottom of the abyss into which we have fallen. ...ª
The access code will be designated as follows:\nand the binary encryption method must be learned and applied. Only some members of the grouping know the cipher itself and the key to it.

The encryption key is:
Encryption using binary code:\ Each letter of Russian alphabet is encrypted with binary code, e.g. letter A=00000, B=00001, C=00010, D=00011..., I=11111.
Example: The word SHIFT. In binary code it looks like this:
11000 01000 10100 10000 
 Now shift it to the LEFT 1 step and we get the code:
10000 10001 01001 00001 
 Now convert it back to letters to get the text:

For reverse decoding, you need to perform a RIGHT shift to get the binary code of the original combination.

%c[0,1,0,0]-%c[default]Cursed Zone. There's nothing left here. Only death. Unbearable, horrible, inhuman. Death pervades and wraps its heavy veil around every particle, every stone, every leaf from a fallen tree. Death generates pain. Pain does not bring relief, does not make you forget all this horror, but only burns you up. It burns you again and again, while you are still conscious of it. What is happening seems beyond our comprehension. We are blinded, lost between the edges of reality. Fuck, I hate all this. But I don't have a way out anymore. I have to get up, check the machine and move on while I still can. While I'm still able to walk... Those Duty guys- she destroyed them so easily, leaving nothing but pain. Why so? Who were those men in the black uniforms carrying death... I don't know. And I don't want to know. Just to get to my bunker... Alive...\n

%c[0,1,0,0]-%c[default]In order to synthesize the poison you need to perform a chemical reaction using three key components. Before you start the synthesis, you need to calculate the concentrations of the input starting ingredients. One of the two reactions of the process, which is chosen to take place under the action of a catalyst, has the following input and output ratios. X*(OCH3)3+Y*(CN)2+Z*(CH3)2=2*(OCH3)(CN)5+6*(CH3)+2*(OCH3)2 X*(OCH3)2+Y*(CN)2+Z*(CH3)2=2*(OCH3)(CN)3(CH3)+8*(CH3)+2*(OCH3) The concentration of one unit of a substance at the input is 10. Calculate the coefficients in the equation and multiply them by the number 10 to determine the input concentrations of the components. The possible values of X,Y,Z multiplied by 10.
30 50 20
 30 20 50
 20 50 30
 20 30 50
 50 30 20
 50 20 30
Radio frequency range, number and type of channels:
Channel 1; frequency 48.975 MHz; closed peacekeeping force.
Channel 5; frequency 53.250 MHz; closed Monolith faction.

Description of the first action. By clicking on the button you tune your radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel. To stop the reception, you must press the "Stop" button. During operation, you cannot switch to another channel.

Description of the second action. By clicking on the button you will tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the grouping "Duty". To stop the reception you must press the "Stop" button. During operation, it is not possible to switch to another channel.

Description of the third action. By clicking on the button you tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the grouping "Freedom". To stop receiving, you must press the "Stop" button. During operation, switching to another channel is not possible.

Description of the fourth action. By clicking on the button, you tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the "Mercenaries" faction. To stop receiving, you must press the "Stop" button. During operation, you cannot switch to another channel.

Description of the fifth action. By clicking on the button you will tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the "Monolith" faction. To stop the reception you must press the "Stop" button. During operation, you cannot switch to another channel.

One day while Muhammad was sleeping near Al-Qaaba, he was awakened by Jibril. The angel had brought with him an extraordinary beast called Burak and told him that it had carried all the Prophets and that it would now carry Muhammad. Muhammad boarded the Burak which carried him by air to Jerusalem. There he met Ibrahim (Abraham), Musa (Moses), Isa (Jesus) and other prophets. They all prayed together and Muhammad led the prayer, then he was offered a drink from three vessels: water, wine and milk. Muhammad chose the milk jar, and that meant his congregation was on the right path. Wine, on the other hand, has been forbidden to Muslims ever since. Then a ladder descended to him, on which he and Jibril ascended to the seven heavens. In the lower heaven He saw Adam deciding the fate of the souls of the dead. The angels showed Muhammad hell, and he felt the heat of the fire and saw the terrible torment of sinners. As He ascended from heaven, He met the Prophets: on the second, Isa; on the third, Jusuf; on the fourth, Idris; on the fifth, Harun; on the sixth, Musa; on the seventh, Ibrahim....

...Then Muhammad visited Paradise, where he saw the bliss of the believers. Then Allah spoke to him and obliged Muslims to pray 50 times a day. When Muhammad went back down, Musa persuaded him to return to Allah and ask Him to reduce the number of prayers. This was repeated several times until the number of prayers for the Muslims was reduced to five a day. When Muhammad told of his journey, he was not believed. People said, "The caravan goes there for a whole month, how can you fly there in one night?" Even Abu Bakr, a loyal friend of his, had doubts. Then Muhammad described to him the Jerusalem he had seen from above, which he had never been to before. These descriptions matched Abu Bakr's memories of the city and Muhammad's words were confirmed to be true. Muhammad also told of a caravan which he had also seen from above. The caravan arrived in Mecca some time later and his story was confirmed.

One day a mullah came into the hall to address the worshippers. The hall was empty except for a young stable boy who sat in the front row. The mullah thought to himself: "Should I speak or not?" So he ventured to ask the groom: - There is no one here but you, do you think I should speak or not? The groom replied: - Sir, I am a simple man, I know nothing about it. But when I come to the stable and see that all the horses have scattered and there is only one left, I will still give it something to eat. The mullah, taking these words to heart, began his sermon. He spoke for more than two hours and when he finished he was relieved. He wanted to hear confirmation of how good his speech had been. He asked: - How did you like my sermon? - I have already said that I am a simple man and do not really understand it all. But if I come to the stable and see that all the horses have scattered and there is only one left, I will feed her anyway. But I don't give her all the feed that is meant for all the horses.

Ibrahim became disillusioned with idols and sought other gods: "And when night covered him, he saw a star and said: "This is my Lord!" And when it rolled up, he said: "I don't like the sunset." When he saw the moon rising, he said: "This is my Lord!" And when it went down, he said: "Unless my Lord leads me on a straight path, I shall be of the people who have gone astray." And when he saw the sun rising, he said: "This is my Lord, he is the greater!" And when it had set, he said: "O my people, I have no part in that which you give Him as a partner. Now I have turned my face to Him who created the heavens and the earth, worshipping Him purely, and I am not of the polytheists." (Quran,6:76-79)

An eastern ruler wanted to know the whole history of mankind. A wise man brought him five hundred volumes. Busy with affairs of state, the king sent him away, commanding him to put it all in a shorter form. After twenty years the wise man returned: the history of mankind now occupied only fifty volumes, but the king was already too old to be able to cope with so many thick books, and sent the wise man away again. Another twenty years passed, and the aged, gray-haired sage brought the king a single volume containing all the wisdom of the world that he longed to know. The king, however, was on his deathbed, and had no time to read even one of the books. Then the wise man expounded to him the history of mankind in a single line, and it read: "Man is born, suffers and dies.
